headline.main: The British Annual Budget.; The UNIMPORTANCE OF MR. GLADSTONE'S RECOMMENDATION.

docs.lead_paragraph: As we read in the military intelligence from across the Atlantic, there are immense armies, weeks of marching and countermarching, preparations always on the point of completion, movements always to be made, at last whole days of fighting and slaying; prodigious slaughter, unparalleled bravery, and, when the worst comes to be made out, fifty are found killed or missing on one side, and it is hoped as many on the other.

docs.snippet: The Senate, in Committee of the Whole, Mr. YOUNG in the Chair, took up the Metropolitan Health bill.

headline.main: PROCEEDINGS OF THE LEGISLATURE; SENATE. ASSEMBLY.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate, in Committee of the Whole, Mr. YOUNG in the Chair, took up the Metropolitan Health bill.

docs.snippet: In the Senate, the Metropolitan Health Bill was considered in Committee of the Whole. It appeared during the debate that the Committee to whom it had been referred had agreed to strike out the "Police Commissioners," and insert the "Mayors of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the Senate, the Metropolitan Health Bill was considered in Committee of the Whole. It appeared during the debate that the Committee to whom it had been referred had agreed to strike out the "Police Commissioners," and insert the "Mayors of the Cities" in their place, but the bill had been printed without this amendment. After some argument, it was agreed to strike out all relating to the Police Commissioners, 14 to 13.

docs.snippet: This morning opened cooler than yesterday a strong breeze blowing from the sea. Gen. BENHAM proposed a visit to Gen. STEVENS at Beaufort, and I was glad to accept an invitation to join his party.

headline.main: FROM GEN. HUNTER'S DEPARTMENT; A Trip to Beaufort--Scenery on the Route--Deserted Plantations--Ancient Fortifications--Appearance of Beaufort--The Palaces and Gardens--Air of Desolation--Absence of Hotel Accommodations--Brig.-Gen. Stevens.

docs.lead_paragraph: This morning opened cooler than yesterday a strong breeze blowing from the sea. Gen. BENHAM proposed a visit to Gen. STEVENS at Beaufort, and I was glad to accept an invitation to join his party.

docs.snippet: The bill to prevent frauds in the opening and laying out of streets and avenues in New-York, and the City tax-levy, well reported favorably, and ordered to the Committee of he Whole.
